    • updateWhatToDo

      public java.lang.String[][] updateWhatToDo()
      Every Card knows the Actions that are going to happen during the Player's turn. The method gives the values to the View to know which action to call and in which phase of the turn.
      Specified by:
      updateWhatToDo in interface ViewObserver
      Returns:
      actions to do during the Player's turn

    • updateStart

      Update method to choose the right worker only if it is available during the starting phase of turn.
      Specified by:
      updateStart in interface ViewObserver
      Parameters:
      i - worker id chosen by the player (1 = worker1 or 2 = worker2)

    • updateEnd

      public void updateEnd()
      Used to set the new current player due to the end of former current player. The new currentPlayer value will be the next of the new turn only if the Player has not lost yet.
      Specified by:
      updateEnd in interface ViewObserver
